original: gal te btsun pa rab 'byor nyid 'di nas kyang med par gyur la pha rol tu'ang mi skye na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig /
analyzed: gal te btsun pa rab 'byor nyid 'di nas kyang med par gyur la pha rol tu'ang mi skye na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig /
translated: If, Venerable Subhūti, you do not exist here and will not be reborn elsewhere, then accept this alms-food.

original: gal te btsun pa rab 'byor gyis 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug mnyam pa nyid kyis nyon mongs pa med pa mnyam pa nyid du yongs su mkhyen la /
analyzed: gal te btsun pa rab 'byor gyis 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug mnyam pa nyid kyis nyon mongs pa med pa mnyam pa nyid du yongs su mkhyen la /
translated: If, Venerable Subhūti, you know the equality of afflictions through the equality of desire, anger, and ignorance,

original: nyon mongs pa med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis kyang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug mnyam pa nyid du yongs su mkhyen na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis kyang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug mnyam pa nyid du yongs su mkhyen na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig /
translated: and you know the equality of desire, anger, and ignorance through the equality of afflictions, then accept this alms-food.

original: gal te btsun pa rab 'byor so so'i skye bo'i sa las kyang ma 'das la 'phags pa'i sa la'ang ma zhugs na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig /
analyzed: gal te btsun pa rab 'byor so so'i skye bo'i sa las kyang ma 'das la 'phags pa'i sa la'ang ma zhugs na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig /
translated: If, Venerable Subhūti, you have not transcended the level of ordinary beings and have not entered the noble levels, then accept this alms-food.

original: gal te btsun pa rab 'byor snang ba'ang ma lags /🔽snang bar 'gro ba'ang ma lags /
analyzed: gal te btsun pa rab 'byor snang ba'ang ma lags / snang bar 'gro ba'ang ma lags /
translated: If, Venerable Subhūti, you are not light,🔽not going to light,

original: 'khor ba la'ang ma zhugs /
analyzed: 'khor ba la'ang ma zhugs /
translated: not engaged in saṃsāra,

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'ang mi thob; brdzun du smra ba'ang ma lags /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'ang mi thob; brdzun du smra ba'ang ma lags /
translated: You do not even attain nirvāṇa, and you do not even speak falsely.

original: bden par smra ba'ang ma lags na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig /
analyzed: bden par smra ba'ang ma lags na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig /
translated: You do not even speak truthfully, so in that case, accept this alms-offering!

original: gal te btsun pa rab 'byor gyis zag pa'ang zad par mi mdzad la mi zad pa'ang 'khrug par mi mdzod /
analyzed: gal te btsun pa rab 'byor gyis zag pa'ang zad par mi mdzad la mi zad pa'ang 'khrug par mi mdzod /
translated: “If, Venerable Subhūti, you do not cause the defilements to be exhausted, nor do you cause the unexhausted to be disturbed,

original: phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams las kyang mi g-yo la rten pa ma mchis par yang nyon @347a *//
analyzed: phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams las kyang mi g-yo la rten pa ma mchis par yang nyon @347a *//
translated: you do not waver from the aggregates, elements, and sense-spheres, nor do you rely on them,

original: mongs pa ma mchis pa bsam gtan du mdzad /
analyzed: mongs pa ma mchis pa bsam gtan du mdzad /
translated: you make the absence of afflictions into concentration,

original: thams cad la'ang rtag tu smon pa mi mnga' la chos rnams kyang sems kyis shin tu thugs su chud na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig /
analyzed: thams cad la'ang rtag tu smon pa mi mnga' la chos rnams kyang sems kyis shin tu thugs su chud na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig /
translated: and you always have no aspirations towards anything, and you fully understand phenomena with your mind, then in that case, accept this alms-offering!

original: btsun pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: btsun pa rab 'byor /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti,

original: gal te khyod kyis gang gi phyir rab tu byung ba'i chos de ma rtogs na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig /
analyzed: gal te khyod kyis gang gi phyir rab tu byung ba'i chos de ma rtogs na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig /
translated: if you have not realized the Dharma for which you went forth, then in that case, accept this alms-offering!”

original: btsun pa rab 'byor gyi nyon mongs pa med pa gang lags pa dang / sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nyon mongs pa med pa gang lags pa /
analyzed: btsun pa rab 'byor gyi nyon mongs pa med pa gang lags pa dang / sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nyon mongs pa med pa gang lags pa /
translated: Venerable Subhūti, whatever is the absence of afflictions of the venerable Subhūti, and whatever is the absence of afflictions of the beings in the hells,

original: btsun pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: btsun pa rab 'byor /
translated: Venerable Subhūti,

original: gal te nyon mongs pa med pa 'di gnyis la yon gnas ches lhag pa ma mchis na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig /
analyzed: gal te nyon mongs pa med pa 'di gnyis la yon gnas ches lhag pa ma mchis na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig /
translated: if there is no difference in the excellence of these two absences of afflictions, then accept this alms-food.

original: 'phags pa rab 'byor la yon gnas yin par 'du shes skyed pa gang lags pa de dag ni btsun pa rab 'byor la med pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pas skur pa 'debs pa ste /
analyzed: 'phags pa rab 'byor la yon gnas yin par 'du shes skyed pa gang lags pa de dag ni btsun pa rab 'byor la med pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pas skur pa 'debs pa ste /
translated: Those who conceive of the venerable Subhūti as a worthy recipient are slandering the venerable Subhūti with what is not so, with what is not true.

original: gal te btsun pa rab 'byor khyod chos de lta bu dang ldan na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig /
analyzed: gal te btsun pa rab 'byor khyod chos de lta bu dang ldan na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig /
translated: If, venerable Subhūti, you possess such a Dharma, then accept this alms-food.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis sgo khang de g-yos par byas nas lag pa g-yas pa brkyang ste 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis sgo khang de g-yos par byas nas lag pa g-yas pa brkyang ste 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then the venerable Subhūti, having shaken that gateway, extended his right hand and said this:

original: che zhe / gang dag yang dag par smra ba na 'di lta bu'i ches dang ldan par smra ba de @347b dag ni bdag la yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin no //
analyzed: che zhe / gang dag yang dag par smra ba na 'di lta bu'i ches dang ldan par smra ba de @347b dag ni bdag la yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin no //
translated: “Sister, those who speak in this way with such conviction are speaking to me with perfect truth.

original: de skad ces smras nas bsod snyoms de blangs so //
analyzed: de skad ces smras nas bsod snyoms de blangs so //
translated: ” Having said this, he accepted the alms.

original: de nas bud med des tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de nas bud med des tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then the woman said to the venerable Su­bhūti, “Excellent!”

original: gang dag mnyam pa nyid kyis bsod snyoms len pa'i yon gnas de dag ni dkon no //
analyzed: gang dag mnyam pa nyid kyis bsod snyoms len pa'i yon gnas de dag ni dkon no //
translated: and she said, “Those who receive alms with such equality are worthy of offerings.

original: smras pa / mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams ni mnyam pa nyid 'di sun phyung ste smad nas phal cher sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: smras pa / mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams ni mnyam pa nyid 'di sun phyung ste smad nas phal cher sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
translated: ” He replied, “Those who are conceited will disparage this equality and will mostly go to the hells.

original: de nas lha des tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de nas lha des tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: ” Then the god said to the venerable Su­bhūti,

original: btsun pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: btsun pa rab 'byor /
translated: “Venerable Su­bhūti,

original: khyod kyis ci las bsams te /
analyzed: khyod kyis ci las bsams te /
translated: what do you think

original: gang dag chos 'di su na phyung ste smad nas phal cher sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes de skad smra /
analyzed: gang dag chos 'di su na phyung ste smad nas phal cher sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes de skad smra /
translated: Those who disparage this teaching will mostly go to the hells.

original: smras pa / lha /
analyzed: smras pa / lha /
translated: Śakra said, “Venerable Subhūti,

original: 'di ji snyam du sems /🔽sgyu ma'i chos 'ga' zhig la 'di ni rgyu dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ji snyam du sems / sgyu ma'i chos 'ga' zhig la 'di ni rgyu dang bcas pa'o //
translated: what do you think?🔽Do you find fault with or disparage any illusory phenomena,

original: 'di ni rgyu med pa'o zhes sun 'byin ba'am /
analyzed: 'di ni rgyu med pa'o zhes sun 'byin ba'am /
translated: saying, ‘This has a cause,

original: smod par byed dam /
analyzed: smod par byed dam /
translated: but that does not’?🔽”

original: smras pa / btsun pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / btsun pa rab 'byor /
translated: “Divine Prince,

original: de ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni ma yin no //
translated: I do not.”

original: smras pa / lha /🔽de bzhin du chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rtogs na bdag gis sun dbyung ba'am /
analyzed: smras pa / lha / de bzhin du chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rtogs na bdag gis sun dbyung ba'am /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti,

original: smad du ci zhig yod /
analyzed: smad du ci zhig yod /
translated: if all phenomena are understood to be like an illusion, what is there to find fault with or disparage?

original: lha; gzhan yang /🔽bdag ni sems can thams cad kyis yang dag pa'am /🔽yang dag pa ma yin pa brjod pa'i sgra de dag @348a *//
analyzed: lha; gzhan yang / bdag ni sems can thams cad kyis yang dag pa'am / yang dag pa ma yin pa brjod pa'i sgra de dag @348a *//
translated: Divine Prince,

original: thams cad dang mnyam mo //
analyzed: thams cad dang mnyam mo //
translated: I am the same toward all the sounds that sentient beings make, whether they are true or not.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: brjod pa thams cad ni sgyu ma'i ngo bo nyid kyis brjod du med do //
analyzed: brjod pa thams cad ni sgyu ma'i ngo bo nyid kyis brjod du med do //
translated: All sounds are essentially illusory and beyond expression.

original: bsod snyoms len pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha'i bu brgya chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go /
analyzed: bsod snyoms len pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha'i bu brgya chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go /
translated: When this teaching on the taking of alms was being delivered, the eye of the Dharma arose in one hundred divine princes, free of dust and stainless.

original: de nas bud med des 'phags pa rab 'byor la bzod pa gsol nas 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de nas bud med des 'phags pa rab 'byor la bzod pa gsol nas 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then that woman, having asked the noble Subhūti to forgive her, said this:

original: btsun pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: btsun pa rab 'byor /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti,

original: bshos gsol nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der bzhud cig dang / bdag kyang chos mnyan pa'i slad du der mchi'o //
analyzed: bshos gsol nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der bzhud cig dang / bdag kyang chos mnyan pa'i slad du der mchi'o //
translated: after taking your meal, go to where the Blessed One is, and I too will go there to listen to the Dharma.”

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bsod snyoms de blangs nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer nas byung nas de chos thos pa'i dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' bas zas la sems mi 'jug par gyur nas de 'di snyam du sems te bdag gis bsod snyoms blangs na gang la log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ba su zhig la sbyin par bya snyam mo //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bsod snyoms de blangs nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer nas byung nas de chos thos pa'i dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' bas zas la sems mi 'jug par gyur nas de 'di snyam du sems te bdag gis bsod snyoms blangs na gang la log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ba su zhig la sbyin par bya snyam mo //
translated: Then the venerable Subhūti, having accepted that alms, left the city of Rājagṛha. He, with the joy and supreme joy of hearing the Dharma, became disinterested in food. He thought this: “Having accepted alms, to whom should I give them so that they will not fall into error?”

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad mi len pas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi sems sems kyis shes nas /
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad mi len pas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi sems sems kyis shes nas /
translated: Then the bodhisattva who does not accept any dharma, knowing the thoughts of the venerable Subhūti,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag btsal nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di @348b skad ces smras so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag btsal nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di @348b skad ces smras so //
translated: went to the venerable Subhūti, and having approached him, bowed his head at the feet of the venerable Subhūti and said to the venerable Subhūti:

original: btsun pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: btsun pa rab 'byor /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti,

original: bsod snyoms 'di bdag la byin cig dang / bdag la byin na log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsod snyoms 'di bdag la byin cig dang / bdag la byin na log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: give me this alms-food, so that by giving it to me, it will not be wasted.”

original: smras pa / rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: smras pa / rigs kyi bu /
translated: He said, “Son of noble family,

original: ci khyod tshul khrims blangs pa'am /
analyzed: ci khyod tshul khrims blangs pa'am /
translated: have you taken up morality?

original: tshul khrims la gnas pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: tshul khrims la gnas pa ma yin nam /
translated: Are you abiding in morality?”

original: smras pa / btsun pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / btsun pa rab 'byor /
translated: He said, “Venerable Subhūti,

original: chos thams cad ni blang du med pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni blang du med pa ste /
translated: all dharmas are not to be taken up.

original: de la ni tshul khrims kyang med /
analyzed: de la ni tshul khrims kyang med /
translated: Therein, there is no morality,

original: 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyang med do //
analyzed: 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyang med do //
translated: and there is no immorality.

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni gang lags /

analyzed: rkyen ni gang lags /
translated: What is the reason?”

original: bcom ldan 'das @355a *//🔽kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das @355a *// kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Bhagavān said,

analyzed: khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' bud med 'gyur ba bud med lnga brgyas bskor ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la gtugs pa mthong ngam /

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He said, “Bhagavān,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

original: kun dga' bo /
analyzed: kun dga' bo /
translated: “Ānanda,

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' bud med 'gyur ba 'di bskal pa bgrang ba las 'das pa na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te; 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan gyi rgyal po spobs pa can zhes bya bar 'gyur te /
translated: This bodhisattva woman will fully awaken to unsurpassed and perfect buddhahood after incalculable eons and will become the thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddha King of Qualities Eloquence in the world.

original: des byang chub thob pa na bud med lnga brgya po 'di dag gzungs thob pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bud med 'gyur ba 'dis yon tan gyi rgyan bstan pa gang ngag yin pa'i rgyan brgyad po de dag gis brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgyar 'gyur te /
analyzed: des byang chub thob pa na bud med lnga brgya po 'di dag gzungs thob pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bud med 'gyur ba 'dis yon tan gyi rgyan bstan pa gang ngag yin pa'i rgyan brgyad po de dag gis brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgyar 'gyur te /
translated: When she attains awakening, these five hundred women will attain dhāraṇī, unobstructed eloquence, and the eight ornaments of the bodhisattva great being Woman of Transformation.

original: byang chub sems dpa' de dag de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal po spobs pa can des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro //

translated: Those bodhisattvas will be predicted by the Tathāgata Guṇarājapratibhāna to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: @355b kun dga' bo /
analyzed: @355b kun dga' bo /
translated: Ānanda,

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal po spobs pa can de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang 'byor zhing rgyas la /
translated: the buddha realm of the Tathāgata Guṇarājapratibhāna will be prosperous, flourishing,

original: bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / mi dang / skye bo ma 'phos gang bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / mi dang / skye bo ma 'phos gang bar 'gyur te /
translated: happy, with good harvests, and full of people and beings.

original: dga' ldan gyi lha'i longs spyod dang mnyam par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dga' ldan gyi lha'i longs spyod dang mnyam par 'gyur ro //
translated: It will be like the enjoyments of the Tuṣita gods.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med kyi ming tsam yang med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med kyi ming tsam yang med par 'gyur te /
translated: In that buddha realm the mere name of a woman will not exist.

original: sems can de dag thams cad padma'i snying po las rdzus te skyes nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la gtsang zhing tshangs bar sbyod pa dang / rgyan brgyad po de dag gis brgyan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can de dag thams cad padma'i snying po las rdzus te skyes nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la gtsang zhing tshangs bar sbyod pa dang / rgyan brgyad po de dag gis brgyan par 'gyur ro //
translated: All those beings will be born miraculously from the heart of a lotus, sitting cross-legged, pure, celibate, and adorned with the eight ornaments.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' bud med 'gyur ba de dang / bud med lnga brgya po de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon sum du lung bstan pa thos nas dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba de kho nas ta la bdun srid tsam gyi nam mkha' la 'phags nas /
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' bud med 'gyur ba de dang / bud med lnga brgya po de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon sum du lung bstan pa thos nas dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba de kho nas ta la bdun srid tsam gyi nam mkha' la 'phags nas /
translated: Then, the Bodhisattva who had been transformed from a woman, and the five hundred women, having heard the prophecy of the Bhagavat in their presence, through that very joy and supreme joy rose up into the sky to the height of seven palm trees,

original: de'i mod kho na la khye'u lo bcu drug lon pa tsam du snang bar gyur to //
analyzed: de'i mod kho na la khye'u lo bcu drug lon pa tsam du snang bar gyur to //
translated: and at that very moment they appeared like sixteen-year-old boys.

original: de dag bar snang de las babs te bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tsal nas /
analyzed: de dag bar snang de las babs te bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tsal nas /
translated: They descended from the sky and bowed to the Bhagavat.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas de dag thams cad kyi spyi bor phyag gis byugs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas de dag thams cad kyi spyi bor phyag gis byugs so //
translated: The Tathagata anointed the crowns of their heads with his hand.

original: de nas de dag thams cad kyis de'i tshe gzungs dang / kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo //
analyzed: de nas de dag thams cad kyis de'i tshe gzungs dang / kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo //
translated: Then all of them at that time attained the dharani and the samadhi called Universal Illumination.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the Bhagavat said to the venerable Ananda:

original: kun dga' @356a *//
analyzed: kun dga' @356a *//
translated: Ananda,

original: bo; chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung la gzhan dag la'ang rgyas par yang dag par ston cig /
analyzed: bo; chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung la gzhan dag la'ang rgyas par yang dag par ston cig /
translated: You should uphold this Dharma discourse and teach it extensively to others.”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He replied, “Blessed One,

original: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
analyzed: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
translated: what is the name of this Dharma discourse?

original: 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi /
analyzed: 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi /
translated: How should I remember it?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: kun dga' bo /
analyzed: kun dga' bo /
translated: “Ānanda,

original: de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod kyis spobs pa bkod pa'i rgyan ces bya bar zungs shig /
analyzed: de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod kyis spobs pa bkod pa'i rgyan ces bya bar zungs shig /
translated: you should remember this Dharma discourse as ‘The Ornament of Eloquence.’

original: bud med 'gyur ba lung bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
analyzed: bud med 'gyur ba lung bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
translated: You should also remember it as ‘The Prediction of the Transformation of a Woman.’

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bud med 'gyur ba 'khor dang bcas pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / klu dang /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bud med 'gyur ba 'khor dang bcas pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / klu dang /
translated: ” When the Blessed One had spoken these words,🔽the bodhisattva mahāsattva Transformed Woman and her retinue, the venerable Ānanda, the great hearers, the bodhisattvas, and the world with its gods, nāgas,

original: lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
analyzed: lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
translated: asuras, and gandharvas rejoiced.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
translated: They praised the words of the Blessed One.

original: 'phags pa bud med 'gyur ba lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
analyzed: 'phags pa bud med 'gyur ba lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
translated: This concludes the noble Great Vehicle sūtra “The Prediction for the Transformation of Women.”

original: rgya gar gyi mkhan po pra dzny'a warma dang / sh'i lendra po dhi dang / zhus chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //
analyzed: rgya gar gyi mkhan po pra dzny'a warma dang / sh'i lendra po dhi dang / zhus chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //
translated: The Indian preceptors Prajñāvarman and Śīlendrabodhi, and the chief editor and translator Bandé Yeshé Dé and others translated, edited, and finalized this text.
